[ library(calendar) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

mjd_to_ywd(++MJD, ?YWD)

Convert an MJD to ISO8601 Year-Week-Day representation
MJD
Integer or float
YWD
Variable or structure of the form Year-Week-Day

Description

Convert MJDs to a Year-WeekOfYear-DayOfWeek representation according to ISO 8601, where DayOfWeek is the day number within the week (1 for monday up to 7 for sunday), and WeekOfYear is the ISO8601 week number (where week 1 is the week containing January 4th). Note that January 1 to 3 may belong to the previous year.
